Title: Relates to the reimbursement for medicare charges
Summary: Amends supplementary medical insurance benefits reimbursement amount to include additional charges other than the premium charge; defines health benefit plan of supplementary medical insurance benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง167-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to reimbursement for medicare charges
